plot: Dark clouds loom in the horizon... people flee in terror from the catastrophic consequences of the Evil One's attack and his dance of the damned?? The biggest drama in the history of mankind... well, maybe not quite.
title: El baile maldito
plot_es: Dark clouds loom in the horizon... people flee in terror from the catastrophic consequences of the Evil One's attack and his dance of the damned?? The biggest drama in the history of mankind... well, maybe not quite.
plot_en: Dark clouds loom in the horizon... people flee in terror from the catastrophic consequences of the Evil One's attack and his dance of the damned?? The biggest drama in the history of mankind... well, maybe not quite.
